document_data.mainbody:
iolet Goldhammer was a singer from Reithwin, once a Sel√ªnite town in the Western Heartlands, sometime before the late 14 century DR.
Violet perished sometime before the fall of Reithwin and it being consumed by the Shadow-cursed Lands before the . She was buried in Reithwins graveyard by the northeastern wall of the House of Healing. Her tombstone read "Here rests Violet Goldhammer, beloved singer. May her voice live on in our memories." Violets grave marker remained relatively undamaged and legible as of the .
